Package videoRangePanel.layoutFX

Class VRImageView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
pamViewFX.fxNodes.PamBorderPane
videoRangePanel.layoutFX.VRImageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, VRImage
public class VRImageView extends PamBorderPane implements VRImage
Holds the image and can be used to PAN and zoom
Author:
Jamie Macaulay
